detaileddescription.para: zcnt will increment or decrement when Z input assert
zcnt will increment when phcnt upcount to phmax, decrement when phcnt downcount to 0

listitem.para: 1 - enable watchdog, You can use the qei_wdog_disable open watchdog
0 - disable watchdog, You can use the qei_wdog_enable open watchdog

memberdef.argsstring: (QEI_Type *qei_x, uint32_t phase_count, qei_z_count_inc_mode_t mode, bool z_calibrate)
memberdef.name: qei_phase_config

parameterdescription.para: maximum phcnt number, phcnt will rollover to 0 when it upcount to phmax

listitem.para: 1 zcnt will increment when phcnt upcount to phmax, decrement when phcnt downcount to 0
0 zcnt will increment or decrement when Z input assert

parameterdescription.para: 1- phcnt will set to phidx when Z input assert
phcnt reset value, phcnt will reset to phidx when phcaliz set to 1

memberdef.argsstring: (QEI_Type *qei_x, uint32_t cmp, bool cmp_z, qei_rotation_dir_cmp_t rotation_dir)
memberdef.name: qei_phase_cmp_set

briefdescription.para: read the value of each phase snapshot 0 counter
read the value of each phase snapshot 1 counter
load phcnt, zcnt, spdcnt and tmrcnt into their read registers
load phcnt, zcnt, spdcnt and tmrcnt into their snap registers
reset zcnt, spdcnt and tmrcnt to 0
